text: was a Japanese professional footballer. He played as a defensive midfielder or centre-back. Yokoyama died from brain cancer on 4 January 2024, at the age of 38.横山知伸 コーチ ご逝去のお知らせ ==References== Category:1985 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Footballers from Tokyo Prefecture
title: Tomonobu Yokoyama
